page.title: 20INFORMATION SYSTEMS.
page.content:
The schools which have contributed to the entry for this block all use BBC 'B' microcomputers and appear in the Amenities Count amongst the other statistics collected. { ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS. { All of the work for this block was {carried out and written by children {and staff of the following schools:-} CARR COUNTY JUNIOR SCHOOL
ENGLISH MARTYRS' R.C.PRIMARY SCHOOL
HOB MOOR COUNTY JUNIOR SCHOOL
SCARCROFT ROAD PRIMARY SCHOOL
St.BARNABAS' C.of E. PRIMARY SCHOOL
St.PAUL'S C.of E. PRIMARY SCHOOL Summer Term 1985.
